stripped_text: When you score this agenda, you may add X cards from HQ to the bottom of R&D to draw X cards. The Runner adds X cards from the grip at random to the bottom of the stack, if able.
text: When you score this agenda, you may add X cards from HQ to the bottom of R&D to draw X cards. The Runner adds X cards from the grip at random to the bottom of the stack, if able.
title: Reeducation
